sentence.Network_en: He would first have to learn the Italian, engage an impresario, make contacts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他先得学意大利语, 找一个经理, 签合同.

sentence.Network_en: The impresario will present an expanded series of concerts next season.
sentence.Network_cn: 下个季节将举办一次大型的系列音乐会.

sentence.Network_en: The impresario had buttoned his astrakhan coat.
sentence.Network_cn: 乐团经理扣好了羔皮外套.

gre核心词汇 - 豆丁网 ... importune v 强求 impresario n (剧团)经理乐队指挥演出者舞台监督 impromptu n 即席演出即兴曲.
...管理电视节目的制作。电台制作人(radio producer)，管理广播节目的制作。戏剧制作人(theatrical producer)，管理戏剧制作安排的各个方面。主办人(impresario)，剧团与乐团的监督指挥、经理、总管。在线生产者(online producer)，管理网站内容的制作。游戏制作人或游戏监制(game producer、game directo.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Italian, from impresa 'undertaking'

entry.tran: (剧团等的)经理;(戏剧的)舞台监督;乐队指挥
entry.def: An impresario is a person who arranges for plays, concerts, and other entertainments to be performed.

means.word_mean: 1. a sponsor who books and stages public entertainments
